title: Flow task stats
description: Statistics related to the processing of a Flow capture, derivation, or materialization

ts.description: Timestamp corresponding to the start of the transaction

openSecondsTotal.description: Total time that the transaction was open before starting to commit

txnCount.description: Total number of transactions represented by this stats document

capture.description: Capture stats, organized by collection. The keys of this object are the collection names, and the values are the stats for that collection.

right.description: Documents fed into the combiner from the source

materialize.description: A map of each binding source (collection name) to combiner stats for that binding

transforms.description: A map of each transform (transform name, not collection name) to stats for that transform

bytesTotal.description: Total number of bytes representing the JSON encoded documents

transformStats.description: Stats for a specific transform of a derivation, which will have an update, publish, or both.

source.description: The name of the collection that this transform sources from

input.description: The input documents that were fed into this transform.
